h2_title: How to Find Mother of Flamlings
content: This is actually where you can summon a miniboss called the Mother of Flamlings, and to do so, all you need to give over is 4x Flame Ores. Thankfully, Flame Ores are dropped by Flamlings, so you'll hopefully have enough by this point to summon her immediately. Approach the glowing patch and deliver the Flame Ores.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Flamlings.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Flamlings', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Mother of Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
This is actually where you can summon a miniboss called the Mother of Flamlings, and to do so, all you need to give over is 4x Flame Ores. Thankfully, Flame Ores are dropped by Flamlings, so you'll hopefully have enough by this point to summon her immediately. Approach the glowing patch and deliver the Flame Ores.
